pages.text: $(li)Carrots can be plant in Farmland to generate more Carrots.$(br)$(li)Carrots can be used to feed Pigs.$(br)$(li)You can put Carrots in a Composter to generate Bone Meal.

$(li)Farmers will exchange your Carrots by Emeralds.$(br)$(li)You can use Carrots to craft a Seed Pouch, Carrot Crate, Snowman Lanterns, Carrot on a Stick, Golden Carrot, Adzuki Stew, Adzuki Curry or Rabbit Stew in a Crafting Table too.
